# Pull Request Template

## Summary

Provide a short summary of the changes and their impact.

## Motivation

Why is this change needed? Link issues or context as appropriate.

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Chore / maintenance
- [ ] Security

## Testing

List the commands you ran and relevant results (e.g., `docker-compose exec app php artisan test`).

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project conventions (PSR-12, Prettier, ESLint)
- [ ] Tests added or updated when needed
- [ ] Documentation updated as necessary
- [ ] Ready for review
